scripts.clean: rm -rf ./node_modules/ && rm -rf ./coverage/ && rm -rf ./.nyc_output/ && rm -rf test-results.xml && find . -name '*.js' -delete && find . -name '*.js.map' -delete && rm -f package-lock.json && find . -name '.taskkey' -delete
scripts.test: npm run lint && nyc mocha tests/_suite.js --timeout 10000 && rm -rf ./.nyc_output/
scripts.test-ci: npm run lint && nyc --reporter=cobertura --reporter=html mocha tests/_suite.js --reporter mocha-junit-reporter --reporter-options mochaFile=./test-results.xml --timeout 10000
